testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email........................................................passed And user fills Password fields..............................................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed And logout..................................................................passed
